lead_paragraph: A sampling of protein powder shakes affirms that taste is secondary to the convenience they provide: allowing tech workers to stay put while working.

headline.print_headline: Sip Test: The Taste That Doesn’t Really Satisfy
headline.main: The Taste That Doesn’t Really Satisfy

snippet: A sampling of protein powder shakes affirms that taste is secondary to the convenience they provide: allowing tech workers to stay put while working.
abstract: Sam Sifton reviews liquid meal replacements Space Nutrients, Soylent and Schmilk, saying they are uniformly bland and unpleasant.
